Measure Velocity change¶

Script to measure seismic velocity changes from ambient noise correlation functions. Called as a python program the script accepts the path to a yaml parameter file, reads it and calls the measure_velocity_change() function with these parameters.

The structure of the parameter file and the functionality of the script are described in the following tutorial Ambient Noise Correlation and measure_velocity_change_tutorial.

Created on Oct 20, 2017

Function¶

measure_velocity_changefdgsd
